articles.author: Mark Horowitz and Joanna Moncrieff
articles.title: New study claims antidepressant withdrawal is less common than thought. But there's a big problem - PsyPost
articles.description: A review confirms antidepressant withdrawal exists but is less common and severe than thought. However, it likely underestimates symptoms in long-term users, who are most at risk.
articles.content:
A new review of research about antidepressant withdrawal has confirmed it does exist, but also reports that its less common and severe than previously found.
These findings feed into a growing debat… [+5549 chars]

articles.author: Vladimir Soldatkin, Olesya Astakhova
articles.title: Rosneft's Sechin blasts spare oil output capacity rise in Middle East, West - Reuters
articles.description: Igor Sechin, CEO of Russian energy major Rosneft , said on Saturday that an increase in spare oil production capacity offset efforts by OPEC+ to reduce oil output.
